name: The Nightmare of Druaga
synopsis: Based on the classic 1984 arcade game known as The Tower of Druaga, The Nightmare of Druaga: Fushigino Dungeon continues the story of Gilgamesh and the kingdom of Babylim. Arranged to marry Princess Ki , Gil is forced to change his ambitions of becoming King when a group of mysterious monsters attack the country. While he is gone, a mysterious enchantress captures Ki and Gil must now arm himself with the finest weapons and armor in order to get her back
